channel.title: Could not find the main class. Program will exit
channel.description: Now, when I try to open my compiler it says "Could not find the main class. Program will exit" How do I fix this? (I know this is really brief, I'm not sure what I should tell you guys. :S)

item.title: Could not find the main class. Program will exit
item.dc:creator: @1_pk_ur_s0ul 1 pk ur s0ul
item.description:
@1_pk_ur_s0ul wrote:

[quote=“imsokool22, post:8, topic:317001”]Suppyscape, he is saying that you have .java and .class files and you need a client.class server-side to run your server if you don’t thats what couldnt find main class means it can’t find your client.class.
Also he is saying that you only can edit the .java when you compile it adds it to .class in a wierd format we cant edit with[/quote]

TY imsokool22 =) I can’t speak NOOB very well so thank you lol

Read full topic
item.source: Could not find the main class. Program will exit

item.title: Could not find the main class. Program will exit
item.dc:creator: @imsokool22 imsokool22
item.description:
@imsokool22 wrote:

Suppyscape, he is saying that you have .java and .class files and you need a client.class server-side to run your server if you don’t thats what couldnt find main class means it can’t find your client.class.
Also he is saying that you only can edit the .java when you compile it adds it to .class in a wierd format we cant edit with

item.source: Could not find the main class. Program will exit

item.title: Could not find the main class. Program will exit
item.dc:creator: @relmitos relmitos
item.description:
@relmitos wrote:

[quote=“1 pk ur s0ul, post:3, topic:317001”]It means your client.class is not in your server files.

You must have one to run a server.

Class files are what the server runs off while .Java files are the editable versions so we may edit our servers.

any questions PM me[/quote]

Doh…

Read full topic
item.source: Could not find the main class. Program will exit

item.title: Could not find the main class. Program will exit
item.dc:creator: @1_pk_ur_s0ul 1 pk ur s0ul
item.description:
@1_pk_ur_s0ul wrote:

It means your client.class is not in your server files.

You must have one to run a server.

Class files are what the server runs off while .Java files are the editable versions so we may edit our servers.

any questions PM me

Read full topic
item.source: Could not find the main class. Program will exit

item.title: Could not find the main class. Program will exit
item.dc:creator: @jamessemple jamessemple
item.description:
@jamessemple wrote:

just delete all the fancy shit from ur compiler code and make it this:

@echo off title server compiler javac *.java pause
